name: All In Peace Reforged
status: Doubles Critical, Str ＋20, Luk ＋10, All Attributes ＋14, Cri ＋35, Crit.Dmg ＋20%, Demi-Human Race Damage ＋40%, Max HP ＋23000, Dmg Reduc. ＋5%, Magic Reduc. ＋5%, "All In Peace" has the power to assassinate enemies, the caster can perform successful assassinations without leaving any trace. "All In Peace" enables allies in a 5-meter range to receive [Dreamland Protection]. [Dreamland Protection]: caster enters a hiding state in which he is invisible; the effect lasts 8 seconds; CD: 200 seconds. [Dreamland Protection] cannot be removed by ranged skills, but damage and crowd control effects can still apply to players in [Dreamland Protection]. This effect vanished after attacking targets.
